name: Add new Easyship shipping labels to Google Sheets
description: Every time there is a new shipping label created in Easyship, Make will automatically add this label to a specified Google Sheets spreadsheet. The scenario uses this [example spreadsheet](https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1axEbiCvp3Oo4H2jJcvDPSc2O2LopDsDB1fAdQ8JIVfE/edit?usp=sharing).
